mapper.select: select * from (SELECT rownum num, n.* FROM (SELECT * FROM MAP ORDER BY name asc) n ) where num BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT rno,serial,ddate,tag,loca,tier,title,mid from( SELECT rownum rno,m.serial,m.ddate,m.tag,m.loca,m.tier,m.title,m.mid from( SELECT serial,TO_CHAR(DDATE,'yy/mm/dd') ddate,tag,loca,tier,title,mid FROM MATCHINGBOARD ORDER BY vs DESC,serial desc )m )WHERE rno BETWEEN 1 AND 10
